spec_0001.title: Core Todo Management Features
spec_0001.description: Essential todo functionality including CRUD operations, filtering, and persistence
requirements: Create new todo items with title and description
Filter todos by status (all, active, completed)
Persist data locally and sync with backend
acceptance_criteria: Users can add todos with Enter key or button click
Todo status changes are immediate and persistent

recommendations: Add more implementation details and technical specifications
Add more explicit requirements using 'must', 'should', 'shall' language
